title: Draw The Bridge
fullContent: Home› ArcadeDraw The BridgeBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenDraw The Bridge is the game where you need to use the logic and precision in order to complete all 30 levels. Every level gets more difficult and intense to draw the bridge for the car. Be creative and build a bridge so that the car will be able to collect all 3 starts and reach the flag. Draw The Bridge Controls:On the phone, tap the screen and drag to drawOn pc, click the mouse and drag to drawEmbed URL:https://www.onlinegames.io/games/2021/4/draw-the-bridge/index.htmlThis article was updated on February 28, 20241 Player2DArcadeBrainCarDrawingEmbeddableFreeHTML5KidsLogicMobileMousePhysicsPuzzle
